select DISTINCT t2.course_code, t2.course_name, t2.course_attr, t2.xn, t2.xq, t2.xy_name, t2.skjs_code, t2.skjs_name, t2.sk_bj, t2.xsrs, t2.sk_dd ,(case when t3.code is not null then 1 else 2 end) as "isTxfa", t3.code from sys_data_jsrk t1 left join sys_data_kc t2 on t2.xn = t1.xn and t2.xq = t1.xq and t2.course_code = t1.course_code and t2.skjs_code = t1.user_id LEFT JOIN JXSJ_KCJXSSFA t3 on t3.xn = t2.xn and t3.xq = t2.xq and t3.course_code = t2.course_code and t3.skbj = t2.sk_bj and t3.user_id = t2.skjs_code 1=1
and t1.user_id = #{userId}
and t2.COURSE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{courseName}),'%')
and t3.code is not null
and t3.code is null
ORDER BY t2.course_name
SELECT * FROM JXSJ_KCJXSSFA_ITEM where RELATION_CODE = #{relationCode} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into JXSJ_KCJXSSFA (CODE, COURSE_CODE, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_ATTR, OPEN_COLLEGE, XN, XQ, SKJS, SKBJ, XSRS, SKDD, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE) values (#{code},#{courseCode},#{courseName},#{courseAttr},#{xyName},#{xn},#{xq},#{skjsName},#{skBj},#{xsrs},#{skDd},#{userId},#{userName},CURRENT_DATE)
